item.description:
CHANGE OF VENUE!! One of our members has kindly tracked down a new site for us for April, so we will be meeting at the Starbucks at Newton Centre on Union Street. Geoff says the place "is huge, is very near a large municipal parking lot, and is right on the D Green Line (and by 'on,' I mean 'you can feel the trains go by.') Note that there are two Starbucks within about a quarter mile of each other in Newton Cent. This is the one on Union Street, immediately adjacent to the T stop, not the one on Centre Street, which is pretty tiny."

Google Maps link: http://maps.google.co... aps?q=70%20union%20street%2C%20newton%2C %20ma .

And note that April's meeting will be on Saturday, not Sunday.

See you there!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers April Meetup
